translation.en: ♪ Koa-la-la ♪
[Izzy] It's one of my favorite times of the year on the island.
translation.fr:
C'est une de mes saisons préférées
sur l'île,

translation.en: It's baby koala season!
Lots of little koala babies have been hanging out with their mums in the trees.
translation.fr:
Beaucoup de bébés
restent avec leur mère dans les arbres.

translation.en: But because it's been so hot and dry, koalas need our help now more than ever.
translation.fr: Mais comme il fait chaud et sec, ils ont plus que jamais besoin de nous.

translation.en: It's okay. You're safe with us now.
translation.fr: Ça va. Tu es en sécurité avec nous.

translation.en: Mum, Dad, and I have been rescuing lots of koalas
translation.fr: Avec maman et papa, on secourt et ramène

translation.en: and bringing them home to our koala hospital…
translation.fr: de nombreux koalas dans notre hôpital.

translation.en: …where we treat them
and release them back into the wild when they're ready.
translation.fr: et on les relâche quand ils sont prêts.

translation.en: There's the tree!
This is your new home.
-[Ali] Whoa! -[Izzy] Have fun!
That's it, sweet!
-Bye, Juliet! -[Tim] Bye, Juliet! See ya!
[Izzy] Right now, we've got StormBoy,
translation.fr: En ce moment, on a Tempête,

translation.en: Mango,
Muffin and Cinderella,
Miss Piggy…
and lots and lots of babies!
Chompy, come back!
Teddy, where are you going?
This is the koala nursery.
And we have four baby koalas that we're caring for at the moment.
translation.fr: On s'occupe de quatre bébés en ce moment.

translation.en: They all lost their mums.
So they need each other to learn from and to get koala cuddles.
translation.fr:
et ont besoin d'apprendre ensemble
et de câlins de koala.

translation.en: This is Chompy.
He went from being our smallest baby to our biggest baby.
translation.fr:
C'était notre plus petit
qui est devenu le plus grand.

translation.en: He's the boss.
This is Teddy.
He's one of the shier babies.
This is Pumpkin. [chuckles]
She's our tiniest baby.
She's small, but she's feisty.
Twinkle.
Do you have yourself a Pumpkin?
Twinkle's really patient
and she acts like a mum to the other babies.
translation.fr: et agit comme une mère pour les autres.

translation.en: We are very, very busy at the moment.
translation.fr: On est bien occupés en ce moment.

translation.en: Um… Excuse me, Chompy!
[Ali] Four babies of this size is the most that we've ever had.
translation.fr:
On n'a jamais eu
plus de quatre bébés aussi petits.

translation.en: Having youngsters in care is always...
translation.fr: Prendre soin de petits demande toujours...

translation.en: always takes a lot more time because we have to feed them milk.
translation.fr: plus de temps, car il faut leur donner du lait,

translation.en: We've got to make sure they've got the freshest leaf.
translation.fr: vérifier que les feuilles sont fraîches.

translation.en: We have to work as a team to make sure that everything is done,
translation.fr:
On doit travailler en équipe
pour s'assurer que tout est fait

translation.en: and we just need to make sure we're doing the right thing.
translation.fr: et qu'on fait ce qu'il faut.

translation.en: Oh my goodness! What is going on here?
translation.fr: Oh, mon Dieu ! Il se passe quoi, ici ?

translation.en: It's a koala party.
Hello, babies!
What a whole bundle of trouble.
-Here, Iz, I'll give you the milk. -[Izzy] I'll do Twinkle.
translation.fr:
- Tiens, le lait.
- Je m'occupe d'Étincelle.

translation.en: Okay, I will do Teddy.
Oh my goodness! Come on!
-Here it is. -Pumpkin, can I please borrow Twinkle?
I won't be long. I promise.
Why don't you go annoy Chompy?
[Ali] Oh! Go and annoy Chompy.
Oh! You little monkey!
[Izzy] I have to go kind of fast with Twinkle because she laps it.
translation.fr: Je dois aller vite, car Étincelle lape.

translation.en: Excuse me, Chompy, where are you taking Pumpkin?
translation.fr: Dis, Mâchouille, où tu emmènes Pumpkin ?

translation.en: Don't forget you have Pumpkin on your back
translation.fr: N'oublie pas qu'elle est sur ton dos,

translation.en: and you're squishing her!
Chompy, you are so naughty!
This year, baby season, it's gone very, very dry and very hot.
translation.fr:
Cette saison des bébés
est très sèche et chaude.

translation.en: [Ali] In the wild, the babies,
normally they'd be clinging on to Mum all the time.
translation.fr: restent normalement accrochés à leur mère.

translation.en: But being in the full force of the sun,
mums are getting really exhausted and sometimes the babies get lost.
translation.fr:
les mères fatiguent et parfois,
les bébés se perdent.

translation.en: That's when we need to help them.
translation.fr: C'est là qu'on doit les aider.

translation.en: We've got our hands full at the moment. I'm not really sure we could handle any more than this.
translation.fr:
On a de quoi faire, là.
Pas sûr qu'on puisse faire plus.

translation.en: [Izzy] Oh! We've had a Pumpkin down!
I think everybody's ready for a nap.
translation.fr: Ils sont murs pour la sieste.

translation.en: -Should we get them back to bed? -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- On les remet au lit ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Good night, Teddy. Good night, Twinkle.
translation.fr:
Bonne nuit, Teddy.
Bonne nuit, Étincelle.

translation.en: Good night, Pumpkin and Chompy.
Sleep well!
-[Ali] Hey, Izzy! -[Izzy] Yeah?
We've had a call about a baby koala.
translation.fr: On a eu un appel pour un bébé koala.

translation.en: Oh, okay!
-[Ali] Go! -[Izzy] All right. Stay there, Loki!
[Ali] It's so hot out there that we need to get cracking.
translation.fr:
Avec cette chaleur,
on ne doit pas traîner.

translation.en: -[Izzy] Where's the koala? -[Ali] We think he's near the Sphinx.
translation.fr:
- Où est le koala ?
- Près du Sphinx, il semble.

translation.en: [Izzy] That's a really long hike. We've got to hurry.
[Ali] And the little baby is still separated from the mum in the middle of the heat.
translation.fr:
Et il est toujours séparé de sa mère
en pleine chaleur.

translation.en: He's not safe where he is.
We can't really leave him there any longer.
translation.fr: Il faut le récupérer au plus vite.

translation.en: [Ali] It's way too small to survive on its own.
translation.fr: Il est trop petit pour survivre seul.

translation.en: Let's go.
It's a long walk. It's at least two and a half kilometers.
translation.fr:
C'est loin.
Au moins deux kilomètres et demi.

translation.en: -[Tim sighs] -[Izzy] It's really dry.
-[Tim] It is dry, isn't it? -[Ali] It's so dry.
[Izzy] Is the lady who found him still with the baby?
translation.fr:
La dame qui l'a trouvé
est restée avec lui ?

translation.en: [Ali] Yeah, they're waiting for us.
It's been now away from his mum for most of the day
translation.fr:
Il est loin de sa mère depuis un moment
et la chaleur est terrible.

translation.en: and it's really stinking hot, so he's going to need a drink.
translation.fr:
Il est loin de sa mère depuis un moment
et la chaleur est terrible. Il va avoir besoin de boire.

translation.en: We're almost there.
-Hey! -[Izzy] Hi!
[Tim] He's over here.
[Izzy] It's tiny!
[Tim] Oh, yeah.
-[woman] Thanks ever so much, ladies. -[Izzy] Thank you!
[woman] All right. Oh. No worries.
[Izzy] Hi! It's okay.
He should definitely still be with the mum.
translation.fr: Il devrait être avec sa mère.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, definitely. He's so tiny.
translation.fr: C'est sûr. Il est si petit.

translation.en: [Izzy] He's smaller than any of the other babies we have at home.
translation.fr:
Il est plus petit
que tous ceux qu'on a à la maison.

translation.en: It's okay.
[Ali] Just cuddle him. That's it.
-I've got you. -[Ali] That's it.
There you go.
I think we really need to race him home now and go and get some milk into him.
translation.fr:
Il faut vraiment vite le ramener
et lui donner du lait.

translation.en: Do you want my hat, Iz, to keep him in the shade?
translation.fr: Tu veux mon chapeau pour l'abriter ?

translation.en: -[Izzy] Yes, please. -[Ali] You could put my hat over.
[Izzy] He's grabbing on to me pretty tight.
That's a really good sign.
[Ali] Yeah. I think he must be trusting you now.
translation.fr: Oui. Il doit te faire confiance.

translation.en: [Tim] Let's get this baby home.
[Izzy] I think he's really dehydrated because it's so dry and hot.
translation.fr: Il doit être très déshydraté, il fait si chaud et sec.

translation.en: [Izzy] This one really needs milk.
translation.fr: Il a vraiment besoin de lait.

translation.en: [Ali] All right, Iz, I'll get him some milk.
translation.fr: Je vais lui chercher du lait.

translation.en: This one's so tiny and it was just so very hot up there.
translation.fr:
Il est si petit
et il faisait si chaud là-haut.

translation.en: He needs milk. If I can't get him to take milk, I don't know how he's going to go.
translation.fr:
Il a besoin de lait,
ou je ne sais pas s'il s'en remettra.

translation.en: Shall we?
[Izzy] It's all right.
Mum's a wildlife vet. She's gonna give you some milk.
translation.fr:
Maman est véto.
Elle va te donner du lait.

translation.en: I know it's all strange, baby. It's very different.
translation.fr:
C'est bizarre, je sais.
C'est très différent.

translation.en: [Izzy] You can do this.
This is gonna help you feel better.
[Ali whispers] It's okay.
[Izzy] Good boy!
[Ali chuckles] That's pretty amazing. That's pretty quick going.
[Izzy] Aw, look at his little tongue.
What a smart little boy.
[Izzy] That milk is so good for you.
translation.fr: Ce lait est très bon pour toi.

translation.en: I'm thinking of names.
He's so brave. -[Ali] Mm. -[Izzy] He's strong.
translation.fr: Il est si courageux. Il est fort.

translation.en: What about Ranger?
[Ali] I think that would suit him, -surviving out in the wild by himself. -Yeah!
translation.fr:
Ça lui irait bien,
il a survécu seul dans la nature.

translation.en: Mm, that's a good name.
This is the most koala babies that we've had in at one time.
translation.fr:
On n'a jamais eu
autant de bébés à la fois.

translation.en: Now we're up to five.
Maybe we can start to slowly introduce him to some others. Maybe Twinkle?
translation.fr:
On devrait peut-être
le présenter à d'autres, comme Étincelle.

translation.en: Because she's really calm and she sort of always acts like a mum.
translation.fr:
Elle est très calme
et se comporte toujours comme une mère.

translation.en: I think it'll help Ranger to have Twinkle to cuddle.
translation.fr:
Ça aiderait Ranger
d'avoir Étincelle à câliner.

translation.en: I think you're right, but right now he's very scared and fragile.
translation.fr:
Tu as raison, mais là,
il est très effrayé et fragile.

translation.en: Until he's stronger and more confident,
translation.fr: Il doit être plus fort et confiant

translation.en: he's not ready to meet Twinkle or any of the other babies.
translation.fr: pour rencontrer Étincelle ou les autres.

translation.en: It all just depends on the type of night that he's had.
translation.fr: Ça dépend de la nuit qu'il passe.

translation.en: -[Ali] If he just settles… -[Izzy] Mm-hm.
…and he's calm and quiet and has a good sleep,
translation.fr: qu'il est calme et qu'il dort bien,

translation.en: then maybe think about meeting somebody else.
Yeah. We'll let him sleep and then we'll check on him in the morning?
translation.fr:
Oui. On le laisse dormir
et on revient le voir demain matin ?

translation.en: [Izzy] Good morning, Ranger.
How are you?
-How is he doing, Iz? -Good.
-You want to try giving him a gentle feed? -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Tu veux lui donner à manger ?
- Oui.

translation.en: [Ali] Okay, here you go.
[Izzy] Good boy, Ranger.
He looks so much better this morning.
translation.fr: Il a l'air bien mieux ce matin.

translation.en: -He's a messy eater. -[Ali] I know.
A lot of it is dripping down his chin.
translation.fr: Il en a plein le menton.

translation.en: [Izzy] He's taking his milk really well.
translation.fr: Il boit très bien son lait.

translation.en: He slept really well last night.
translation.fr: Il a très bien dormi cette nuit.

translation.en: I really want to introduce him to the other koalas.
translation.fr: Je veux vraiment le présenter aux autres.

translation.en: Twinkle, especially.
I think the more, like, warmth and cuddles that Twinkle can give him,
translation.fr:
Je pense que plus elle pourra
lui donner de chaleur et de câlins,

translation.en: the more confident, less nervous, and the more safe he feels here, it will help him recover faster.
translation.fr:
plus il se sentira sûr et en sécurité ici
et plus vite il se remettra.

translation.en: I'm not sure that this little boy is at that point yet.
translation.fr: Je doute que ce petit gars soit prêt.

translation.en: A baby as small as Ranger can take up to a week
translation.fr:
Ça peut demander une semaine
à un si petit bébé

translation.en: before he might come out of his shell enough to want to meet anybody else.
translation.fr:
de sortir de sa coquille
et vouloir rencontrer ses prochains.

translation.en: We just got to take it day by day.
[Izzy] I have an idea, Mum.
If I put him down
and maybe if I put the toy koala in front of him
translation.fr:
que je mets
les koalas en peluche devant lui

translation.en: and Ranger's cuddling onto the toy koala,
translation.fr: et qu'il se blottit contre une peluche,

translation.en: maybe it's a sign that we can introduce him.
translation.fr:
ce serait un signe
qu'on peut le présenter.

translation.en: It'll let Ranger show us when he's ready.
translation.fr: Il nous montrerait quand il est prêt.

translation.en: [Ali] Yeah, that's possible.
Ranger, you have to show me that you're confident enough
translation.fr: Ranger, montre que tu es assez confiant

translation.en: to walk over to the toy koala
translation.fr: pour aller voir le koala en peluche

translation.en: so that you'll be able to meet a real-life koala like Twinkle.
translation.fr:
afin de pouvoir rencontrer un vrai koala
comme Étincelle.

translation.en: I think meeting Twinkle will help you feel happier.
translation.fr:
Je crois qu'Étincelle
t'aidera à te sentir mieux.

translation.en: You won't be as lonely.
Come on, Ranger. You can do this.
translation.fr: Allez, Ranger. Tu peux le faire.

translation.en: You can tell that he's still quite scared.
translation.fr: On voit qu'il a encore peur.

translation.en: He's not exploring. He's not curious enough yet.
translation.fr:
Il n'explore pas.
Il n'est pas encore assez curieux.

translation.en: It doesn't matter how slow we go. I'll just make sure that you feel comfortable.
translation.fr:
Même si c'est long,
je m'assurerai que tu sois confiant.

translation.en: We'll try again tomorrow.
[Izzy] Ranger, look!
It's good that you're exploring.
Do you think that you can climb up on this toy koala, Ranger?
translation.fr:
Tu crois pouvoir monter
sur ce koala en peluche ?

translation.en: [whispers] Wrong way.
We'll try again tomorrow.
Are you ready today, Ranger?
You can do this.
Ranger, you're getting more curious.
translation.fr: Tu es de plus en plus curieux.

translation.en: If you keep this up, you'll be able to meet Twinkle soon.
translation.fr:
Continue et tu rencontreras
bientôt Étincelle.

translation.en: We'll try again tomorrow.
[Izzy] Come on, Ranger. I know you can do it.
I need to see that you're confident enough to meet Twinkle.
translation.fr:
Montre que tu es assez confiant
pour rencontrer Étincelle.

translation.en: Keep going, Ranger. You're so close.
You can do this.
Good job, Ranger.
That's so good.
I'm so proud of you.
translation.fr: Je suis si fière de toi.

translation.en: He's definitely happier. He's more confident.
translation.fr:
Il est clairement plus heureux,
plus confiant.

translation.en: He went from being really curled up and small and sad
translation.fr:
Il était triste et replié sur lui-même
et maintenant,

translation.en: to running over and jumping up
onto something that he feels comfortable with.
translation.fr: sur quelque chose qui le rassure.

translation.en: So, these are great signs that he's ready to meet Twinkle.
translation.fr:
Ce sont d'excellents signes
qu'il est prêt à rencontrer Étincelle.

translation.en: That was adorable. [chuckles]
Let's introduce you to Twinkle.
Are you excited, Ranger? You're gonna meet Twinkle today.
translation.fr:
Tu as hâte ?
Tu vas rencontrer Étincelle.

translation.en: [Ali] Hey, little Twinkle.
How you going, baby girl?
You wanna go and meet Ranger?
I think Twinkle's the perfect koala baby for you to meet.
translation.fr:
Je pense qu'Étincelle
est le bébé koala idéal pour toi.

translation.en: [Ali] Come on.
She's kind, she's caring, and she knows how you feel.
translation.fr:
Elle est gentille, attentionnée
et elle sait ce que tu ressens.

translation.en: Hello!
Hello! Look who I've got.
-[Izzy] Hi! -[Ali] Shh.
[Izzy] Ranger, meet Twinkle.
Twinkle, meet Ranger.
Ranger's very excited to see you.
translation.fr: Il a hâte de te rencontrer.

translation.en: He's been waiting so long.
Twinkle, you need to be a really caring big sister to him
translation.fr:
Étincelle, tu dois être
une grande sœur attentionnée,

translation.en: 'cause he's really scared.
Are you two just checking each other out by smelling each other?
translation.fr: Vous faites connaissance en vous sentant ?

translation.en: -Maybe we can pop him next to Twinkle. -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- On pourrait le mettre à côté d'elle.
- Oui.

translation.en: [Ali whispers] Slowly, slowly. Yes.
That's it.
[Izzy] Aw, good job, Ranger.
Twinkle's incredibly patient.
[Ali] She really is such a sweet girl.
Thank you, Twinkle, for looking after him.
I think they're a pretty good match. Yeah?
I think that's the face of contentment from Ranger.
translation.fr:
Le bonheur se lit
sur le visage de Ranger, je crois.

translation.en: Just the fact that he can now cuddle somebody else.
translation.fr:
Rien que de pouvoir
câliner quelqu'un d'autre.

translation.en: This is really going to help Ranger with his recovery,
translation.fr: Ça va vraiment l'aider à se rétablir.

translation.en: just like it has done for the other babies.
He's so comfortable that he's fallen asleep.
translation.fr: Il se sent si bien qu'il s'endort.

translation.en: That's exactly what he would do with his mum in the wild.
translation.fr:
C'est ce qu'il ferait
avec sa mère dans la nature.

translation.en: Yeah, he would. Just goes to show how important koala cuddles are.
translation.fr:
Oui. Ça montre à quel point
les câlins sont importants pour eux.

translation.en: [Izzy] This is the sign of a happy koala.
translation.fr: C'est le signe d'un koala heureux.

translation.en: In this episode, you saw me and my family helping wild animals.
translation.fr:
Dans cet épisode, tu nous as vus
prendre soin d'animaux sauvages.

translation.en: If you see an animal that you think might be sick or injured,
translation.fr:
Si tu vois un animal
qui semble blessé ou malade,

translation.en: don't approach it, tell an adult, and ask them to call a trained professional.
translation.fr:
n'approche pas, préviens un adulte
et dis-lui d'appeler un professionnel.
